official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Interior to prepare a plan to repair and restore the Saratoga Battlefield Monument located in the Saratoga National Historical Park in the State of New York.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to prepare a plan to restore the Saratoga Battlefield Monument, which is located in the Saratoga National Historical Park, New York. Sets forth specified determinations that the Secretary must make with respect to such plan. Authorizes appropriations

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Interior to prepare a plan to repair and restore the Saratoga Battlefield Monument located in the Saratoga National Historical Park in the State of New York.
